title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 472.5 - Maximum gross weight in excess of legal limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 472.5 - Maximum gross weight in excess of legal limits

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 502

In the event that the maximum gross weight set forth in
the permit is in excess of the legal limits provided in the Vehicle and Traffic

Law, nevertheless the issuance of such a permit does not authorize a vehicle to
carry weights in excess of those permitted by the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Accordingly, an operator of a motor vehicle may be guilty of a violation of the
weight provisions of the Vehicle and Traffic Law and subject to the penalties
therein imposed even though the highway use permit issued for such vehicle sets
forth a maximum gross weight in excess of the legal limits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20

472.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
